# ecmacro

<a href="https://xprimexinverse.github.io/ecmacro/"><img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="139" alt="ecmacro website" /></a>

An R package for downloading the latest data from the European Commission's AMECO macro-economic database.

https://economy-finance.ec.europa.eu/economic-research-and-databases/economic-databases/ameco-database_en

## Installation

You can install the development version of ecmacro from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("xprimexinverse/ecmacro")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to use the package:

```{r example}
library(ecmacro)

# Download the data
AMECO <- get_ecmacro()

# Search by CODE (1)
ZUTN <- find_series(AMECO, "zutn", field = 1) 

# Extract and plot a series
IRL_ZUTN <- get_series(AMECO, "IRL.1.0.0.0.ZUTN")
```
